artifacts.summary: Research report documenting \interp vs \ext notation convention from Logos LaTeX project

key_findings: \sem macro should be renamed to \ext for term extension
\interp{\cdot}^\sigma_M should be used for sentence interpretation
Distinction enables homomorphism statement between sentences and propositions
